searchSql.baseSql: with tb as(select CASE_CODE ,CASE_LOAN_REQ ,CASE_CON_PRICE ,MORT_TYPE ,MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ,CASE_ORG_ID_F--组别ID ,CASE_DISTRICT_ID--贵宾服务部ID from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO tb1 where 1=1 <ifNotNull districtId> and CASE_DISTRICT_ID=#districtId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull teamId> and CASE_ORG_ID_F=#districtId# </ifNotNull> and tb1.BELONG_MONTH=#belongMonth# and TRANSFER_ISPASS=1 and convert(varchar(7),TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120)=#choiceMonth#), tb2 as ( select '30016001' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select '30016003' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select '30016002' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select 'NO_LOAN_REQ' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select 'TOTAL' as 'TOTAL' ) select tb2.MORT_TYPE as MORT_TYPE, CASE WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='TOTAL' THEN '合计' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016001' THEN '纯商' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016003' THEN '纯公积金' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016002' THEN '组合' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='NO_LOAN_REQ' THEN '无贷款' END AS MORT_TYPE_CN ,isnull(l1.CASE_COUNT,0) as CASE_COUNT ,isnull(l1.CASE_CON_PRICE,0) as CASE_CON_PRICE ,isnull(l1.MORT_COM_AMOUNT,0) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,isnull(l1.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT,0) as MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from tb2 left join ( select CASE WHEN GROUPING(tn.MORT_TYPE) =1 THEN 'TOTAL' ELSE MORT_TYPE END AS MORT_TYPE, count(tn.MORT_TYPE) CASE_COUNT, isnull(sum(tn.CASE_CON_PRICE),0) CASE_CON_PRICE, isnull(sum(tn.MORT_COM_AMOUNT),0) MORT_COM_AMOUNT, isnull(sum(tn.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT),0) MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from ( select tb.MORT_TYPE as MORT_TYPE, CASE_CON_PRICE as CASE_CON_PRICE, MORT_COM_AMOUNT as MORT_COM_AMOUNT, MORT_PRF_AMOUNT as MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from tb where CASE_LOAN_REQ = 1 and (MORT_TYPE is not null and MORT_TYPE<>'') union all select 'NO_LOAN_REQ' as MORT_TYPE, CASE_CON_PRICE as CASE_CON_PRICE, 0 MORT_COM_AMOUNT, 0 MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from tb where CASE_LOAN_REQ = 0 ) as tn group by tn.MORT_TYPE WITH ROLLUP ) as l1 on tb2.MORT_TYPE=l1.MORT_TYPE

with tb as(select CASE_CODE ,CASE_LOAN_REQ ,CASE_CON_PRICE ,MORT_TYPE ,MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ,CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F--案件主办userID ,CASE_REAL_NAME_F--案件主办姓名 ,CASE_ORG_ID_F--组别ID ,CASE_ORG_NAME_F--组别名称 ,CASE_DISTRICT_ID--贵宾服务部ID ,CASE_DISTRICT_NAME--贵宾服务部名称 ,CASE_REC_STATUS--是否流失 ,LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT--流失金额 ,EVA_EVAL_FEE--案件评估费 ,EVA_RECORD_TIME--案件评估费确实时间 ,ELOAN_PRO--案件对应的金融类产品 ,ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT--金融产品总金额 ,ELOAN_KA--案件对应的卡类产品 ,CASE_USE_CARD_PAY_CN--案件是否刷卡 ,CASE_CARD_PAY_AMOUNT--刷卡金额1 from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO tb1 where 1=1 and tb1.BELONG_MONTH=#belongMonth# and TRANSFER_ISPASS=1 <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and tb1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=#teamId# --(按照组别) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and tb1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=#districtId# --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> and convert(varchar(7),TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120)=#choiceMonth#)
select count(1) as CASE_COUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and t1.MORT_TYPE='30016001'
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if>
) as MORT_COM_COUNT, isnull((select sum(MORT_COM_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and t1.MORT_TYPE='30016001'
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT, isnull((select sum(t1.CASE_CON_PRICE) from tb as t1 where 1=1 <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as CASE_CON_PRICE, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and t1.CASE_REC_STATUS='1' <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ) as LOST_COUNT, isnull((select sum(LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if>
),0) as LOST_AMOUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ) as EVA_COUNT, isnull((select sum(EVA_EVAL_FEE) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if>
),0) as EVA_FEE, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.ELOAN_KA is not null
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if>
) as E_CARD_COUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_USE_CARD_PAY_CN='1'
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if>
) as CARD_COUNT, isnull((select sum(ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1
<if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as E_AMOUNT, <if test="produceType == 'team'"> CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F,--(按照交易顾问) CASE WHEN GROUPING(CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F) =1 THEN '合计' ELSE (select top(1) CASE_REAL_NAME_F from tb as t1 where t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F ) END as CASE_PART </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> CASE_ORG_ID_F,--(按照组别) CASE WHEN GROUPING(CASE_ORG_ID_F) =1 THEN '合计' ELSE (select top(1) CASE_ORG_NAME_F from tb as t1 where t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F ) END as CASE_PART </if> <if test="produceType == ''"> CASE_DISTRICT_ID,--(按照贵宾服务部) CASE WHEN GROUPING(CASE_DISTRICT_ID) =1 THEN '合计' ELSE (select top(1) CASE_DISTRICT_NAME from tb as t1 where t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID ) END as CASE_PART </if>
from tb as t <if test="produceType == 'team'"> group by CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F--(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> group by CASE_ORG_ID_F </if> <if test="produceType == ''"> group by CASE_DISTRICT_ID </if>

SELECT * FROM ( select FIN_ORG_NAME_YC as MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH =#belongMonth#) AS CASE_COUNT, (SELECT isnull(SUM(c.MORT_COM_AMOUNT) / 10000,0) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS MORT_COM_AMOUNT from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code in ( select distinct FA_FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in (select FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_SUP ts where ts.SUP_CAT='0') ) ) t ORDER BY t.CASE_COUNT DESC

SELECT top(20) t.MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, t.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC AS MORT_FIN_SUB_BRANCH_NAME, t.CASE_COUNT, t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT, t.IS_RUWEI_BANK FROM ( select ts.*, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME_YC FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.fa_fin_org_code) AS MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, (SELECT count(*) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.MORT_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS CASE_COUNT, (SELECT round(isnull(SUM(c.MORT_COM_AMOUNT) / 10000,0),2) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.MORT_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS MORT_COM_AMOUNT, (SELECT DISTINCT c.IS_RUWEI_BANK FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.MORT_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS IS_RUWEI_BANK from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG ts right join sctrans.T_TS_SUP as tt on tt.fin_org_code= ts.fin_org_code and tt.sup_cat='0' ) t WHERE t.MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT DESC
